name: Agent 432 Saving Christmas
description:
A very short game I created in 3 days to celebrate the holidays.

Agent 432, your job is to break into a facility to save Christmas!

Also Merry Christmas & Happy New Year! :)

Controls:

  • Move - WASD Keys
  • Look - Mouse
  • Jump - Space
  • Sprint - Shift
  • Pickup - Right Mouse Button
  • Throw - Left Mouse Button
